title: How much data is used per game?
body: I recently relocated to a new suburb and the best internet broadband I could get is one with 100gb per month. Can I play lol regularly with this plan with good ping? Any help is appreciated! Thank you!

replies.body: Honestly, you can play league while capped but teamfights will be a problem occasionally. 100gb a month is more than enough if you're not going to be torrenting music and movies. :)
its actually around 20mb per game. but yh, still a little. nothing to worry about ;)

An average League game takes very little data to actually play. If it did, then *everyone* would be lagging because their connection wouldn't be able to keep up with the upload rates. It's about a 10 megabytes, if that, per game.

What you gotta watch out for is the patcher, where it downloads and uploads patches to and from it. If you want to be extra conservative, make sure to disable peer to peer transfers.
